name: Kayron
description: The Shadow King who deals in grudges
story: An Acolyte, and commander of an army of undead known as the Dust Walkers. It is said that he demands your soul and loyalty in return for releasing you from your grudges.
get_line: I have descended in answer to your call.

relations.description: Vildred is easy to control and has proved quite useful.
Ras wastes his time delaying the inevitable death of the world and providing false hope.
It's impossible to rely on somebody with such an unpredictable and impulsive character.

upgrade.description: It's impossible to rely on somebody with such an unpredictable and impulsive character.

relations.description: It's impossible to rely on somebody with such an unpredictable and impulsive character.
He takes everything too lightly, it's a pain to talk with him.
Diene stood in Kayron's way and needlessly complicated everything, though she eventually paid the price.
A pathetic and pitiable being. However, Kayron is inclined to grant his wishes as long as he has what Kayron wants.
Kayron knows he is filled with countless regrets, regardless of whether he acknowledges them or not.

specialty.name: Desire for Ruin
specialty.description: He destroys everything with his army of Dust Walkers, yearning for the annihilation of the world.

type.name: Time Limit
type.description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.

skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.

skills.name: Immortal Will
skills.description:
Grants immortality for 1 turn when the caster receives lethal damage and resets skill cooldown of Apocalypse.
Can only be activated once every {{variable}} turn(s).
On the caster's turn, when buffed and using Void Slash, the skill will become an AoE attack and does not trigger Dual Attack.

skills.name: Apocalypse
skills.description: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword. When the enemy is defeated, extends the duration of any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, extends the duration of any buffs already granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

buffs.name: Immortal
buffs.effect: The target cannot be killed for a certain number of turns.

ex_equip.name: Grudge Marble
ex_equip.description: A marble filled with the grudges of people who pledged their souls and loyalty to Kayron

skills.description: Damage dealt is increased by 10% when using Void Slash.
Damage dealt is increased by 10% when using Apocalypse.
Inflicts silence for 1 turn when using Apocalypse.
skills.skill_description: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword, before inflicting silence for 1 turn and increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, extends the duration of any buffs already granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

skill1.name: 虚空斬
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で命中率DOWNを1ターンの間付与する。自身の現在の生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 不死なる意志
skill2.desc:
気絶するダメージを受けた時、自身に不死を1ターンの間付与し、【黙示録】のスキルターンが0になる。
この効果は9ターンに1回まで発動する。
自身が強化状態の場合、自身のターンで発動する【虚空斬】が全体攻撃に変化し、連携攻撃が発生しない。

skill3.name: 黙示録
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、自身の強化効果を1ターン延長させる。自身の生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。
